title: Stonehearth_v0.1.0_dev.2137
description:
Latest dev version of Stoneheart

v0.1.0 dev.2133:
Fix Save Overwrite Bug
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ The bug which would sometimes cause a save to be deleted when you try to overwrite it has been squashed. Hooray!!
v0.1.0r205:
The Blacksmith
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ The blacksmith crafts weapons and armor for your footmen.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ To get a blacksmith, have your Mason craft a BlacksmithÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Hammer
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Mine ore from mountains, then have the Blacksmith smelt it into ingots
Mining, Phase 2
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Ore will now drop from stone voxels
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Lots of bug fixes and performance enhancements
Party System
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ The party system allows you some degree of control of your hearthlingsÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ movements.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Access the party management screen using the red banner icon on the main toolbar
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Parties can be of any size and contain any mix of jobs
New Rules for Immigration
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ You will now receive a daily update with the requirements for gaining new hearthings to your town. If you fulfill the requirements, you will always be granted the option of accepting a new settler.
New Lighting Model, Stage 1
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Lights now cast somewhat realistic shadows
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Fire now glows. Oooooo.
v0.1.0r201:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Goblins no longer sleep in your beds
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Ore veins in mountains are now clickable
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Fixed a bug where tools are spammed into the world when a crafter dies
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Ingots now require 2 ore to smelt, down from 4
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Drastically reduced the food requirement to gain new citizens
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Increased the net worth requirement to gain new citizens
